lyrics:
64 contributorstranslationsdeutschitâ€™s called freefall lyricsverse 1
called to the devil and the devil did come

verse 2
some days end when i need a few friends
now and again i could never hope to keep them
thought to give friends what i thought that they wanted
never had they needed a good friend as ive been

verse 3
dont get me ventin on friends who resent you
cause all youve ever done is been a noose to hang on to
they thought was a necklace and reckless
they fell into hell where you both hang with nothing to do but

prechorus
scratch kick let gravity win like
fuck this let gravity win like

chorus
you could let it all go
you could let it all go
its called freefall
its called freefall
you might also likeverse 4

off the same deal youre on

chorus
well you could let it all go

its called freefall
its called freefall

verse 5
called to the devil and the devil said hey

its like 2 am and the bars all close at 10 in hell

anyway you say youre too busy
savin everybody else to save yourself
and you dont want no help oh well

chorus
like you could let it all go
you could let it all go
its called freefall
